item.description: Israel is marking the Oct. 7 attack anniversary amid its intense airstrike campaign across Lebanon, which includes continued airstrikes in Beirut.

item.title: Nobel Prize in medicine honors two Americans for discovery of microRNA
item.description: The Nobel Assembly said that the discovery is “fundamentally important.”

item.title: FDA's Promised Rules on Pulse Oximeters Unlikely To End Decades of Racial Bias
item.description: For decades, widely used pulse oximeters have underestimated the oxygen needs of darker-skinned patients. Will the FDA's new guidelines fix that?

item.description: For Nova Music Festival survivor Eitan Halley, a year has done little to heal the scars left by Hamas' terror.
